RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Graduaчуo em Processamento de Dados pela Universidade Presbiteriana Mackenzie (1983), mestrado em Computaчуo Aplicada pelo INPE - Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais (2001) e doutorado em Engenharia e Gerenciamento de Sistemas Espaciais (2014). RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
bachelor's at Tecnologia Em Processamento de Dados from Universidade Presbiteriana Mackenzie (1983) and master's at Computer Science from Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais (2001). Has experience in Computer Science, focusing on Programming Languages, acting on the following subjects: data mining, artificial intelligence, ensino a distтncia, suguranчa de software and anomaly detection.
Graduation in the Data Processing at Mackenzie University (1983), Master in Applied Computing at INPE - National Institute for Space Research (2001) and PhD in Engineering and Space Systems Management (2014). Technologist at the National Institute for Space Research. Experience in computer science, with emphasis on Programming Languages and Software Engineering. Currently, working on the following topics: Data Mining, Dependability and Satellite Simulators.

Participei de um programa de transferъncia de tecnologia relativo ao sistema de Recepчуo e Processamento de Imagens de Satщlite desenvolvido pela empresa canadense MacDonald Dettwiler e adquirido pelo INPE.
